high_descs: Turn around and face toward the large white table
Pick up the dark pen from the table
Turn around and walk up to the floor lamp by the sofa

high_descs: Turn completely around to face the white table that is behind you.
Pick up the pen that is on the table.
Turn around and walk up to the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a pen under the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around to your left and face the table

Pick up

Turn to your left move forward then go to the lamp on your left
